name: iq-worklist-scheduler
description: iQ-WORKLIST SCHEDULER is a web-based graphical front-end for iQ-WORKLIST to schedule procedures in a DICOM environment.

scripts.build: tar -xf %npm_package_name%-%npm_package_version%.tgz && ren package iQ-WORKLIST_SCHEDULER && tar -a -cf iQ-WORKLIST_SCHEDULER_%npm_package_version%_Setup.zip iQ-WORKLIST_SCHEDULER

author: Stephan Olschowsky
license: SEE LICENSE IN iQ-WORKLIST SCHEDULER 1.1 EULA CON INT EN - 001R.rtf
